elements.name: Submitting get request for dr_d1 json formatted end point and validating expected output data is matching with actual data for a scenario:dr_d1_sc_json.json

steps.name: I select the environment on which the execution is to be processed
I submit a get request with the required request parameters such as s000000004,counter,2016-01-01,2016-12-31,sc and json
I provide the service url dr_d1 and wait until response is 200
